name: A-Train Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent or second trip in 6 months at the Atrain hotel Amsterdam,rooms are spotless,staff are very friendly. Breakfast was included in the impressive pullman lounge on a daily basis,breakfast is continental but includes cereals/toast/ham/cheese/boiled eggs/tra/coffee.
reviews.title: Cant go wrong!

reviews.text: A-train hotel is directly across from cental station, and within easy walking distance of all the attractions,theres also a lift in the hotel,if you book room a204 you can smoke tobacco in this room.
reviews.title: Friendly staff and small hotel

reviews.text: Look forward to seeing you all again in the near future,thanks for a great stay. Bob & Kathy.
reviews.title: small hotel with service as a steam engine

reviews.text: Small room with friendly staff.. Location was great and near the train station..breakfast was simple and wonderful... Great service and great place to stay... We stayed 3nites on Dec 2011... Near shopping area.. Beautiful place and very warm people.. Love to come again to Amsterdam.. Only during our stay at this hotel, its raining at night and the window and carpet are all wet.. Overall its wonderful to stay... Thks for the excellent service to Mr Ali...
reviews.title: Friendly Hotel

reviews.text: 5 day trip to amsterdam to explore the culinary art of today
reviews.title: great 2day trip

reviews.text: Only a minute from Amsterdam main train station, this hotel is ideally situated for travellers who arrive late at night in the city. This in itself is already a great advantage, however, there are many more reasons why I would recommend it. First of all, it has a very friendly atmosphere which reflects the attitude of all members of staff we encountered. The railway enthusiast interior is cozy and somewhat quirky and will I think bring a smile to any travellers's lips.
reviews.title: Hotel with a happy passion for trains

reviews.text: Our top floor room and ensuite bathroom were very calm, clean and pleasant. Beds were impeccable. The hotel has no restaurant but offers a nice and perfectly satisfying breakfast buffet. I found the price-value ratio excellent. Everything was so easy in A Train that I would really like to go back there some day.
reviews.title: good position good comfortable ,nice hotel

reviews.text: Look like stay in the train, good clean, breakfast so fine. I like this hotel very much.
reviews.title: Quite nice and very convienent place to stay would recomend it to anyone

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And If I return to Amsterdam, I will stay this hotel again surely. Near Amsterdam station is very good connection.
reviews.title: Short break in Amsterdam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: just returned from a brill break in amsterdam, the hotel offers great value for money, the staff are helpful and friendly, the room was comfortable and clean, buffet breakfast was fresh and tasty, the location of the hotel is the biggest plus left out of the door for the canals right for dam square shops etc. perfect ! worth checking the discount cards for attractions etc every euro counts !
reviews.title: long weekend amsterdam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We always stay here on our citybreaks to Amsterdam and each time it just gets better. We were upgraded to Room 102 a first class room with a great view over to Centraal which was surpisingly quiet at night despite the main traffic route right outside.The breakfast with freshly boiled eggs and their delicious toasted raisin bread in their unique breakfast room continues to delight. This place is perfect for smokers with dedicated rooms you can book online which means that the non-smoking rooms are fresh for those who don't smoke. We 've never been disappointed and the staff ensure it stays that was
reviews.title: Keeps getting better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed here for a long weekend for his Birthday. The staff were always friendly and helpful and the room was spotless, we asked for a possible front facing room and that was exactly what we got,
reviews.title: Weekend Break in Amsterdam

reviews.text: We arrived late morning thinking we would have to wait till after lunch to check in, however staff were so accommodating and asked if we would like to sit in the breakfast area for coffee they would have our room ready within 20 minutes, excellent service.
reviews.title: Good Motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect location for a late arrival at Amsterdam Centraal. The staff is really friendly.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel

reviews.text: We had the Old Dutch Suite with a private patio, totally isolated from street noises.
reviews.title: Train themed hotel in excellent position

reviews.text: The breakfast is a self-service and is OK (just missed some croissants or cakes).
reviews.title: A wonderful Hotel to stay in!!

reviews.text: Last important point: they have a locked room for your stuff in case you want to enjoy your last day in Amsterdam after check-out.
reviews.title: Good for a short break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The position of this nice *** hotel is perfect: right in front of the Central Station and with lots of restaurants all around. Furthermore, just crossing the road there's the pick up and drop off point of the bus going to and from Eindhoven Airport.
reviews.title: Location excellent

description: The amazing A-Train Hotel is a unique 3* hotel ideally located in front of the Central Station. Shopping areas, tourist attractions, pubs, restaurants, etc., are all within walking distance. All major tram, bus, metro lines operate from the Central Station, only 15-20 minutes from Schiphol Airport, RAI and WTC. All rooms are comfortably furnished and have modern bathrooms, a safe and high speed internet access, Wifi and cable.
